displaytitle: Sketches of Male Figures and Horse
medium: Pen and brown ink on cream laid paper
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed: Lower right: Sirani --- --- [?] da Sala g. anr [canceled letters] 63

titles.title: Sketches of Male Figures and Horse

texts.textentryhtml: Less elaborate in its technique than the composition study above, this sheet is covered by quick exploratory sketches of the human figure in motion—a favorite subject for sixteenthcentury Italian artists. The boundaries between observation and imagination are blurred in Perino’s exaggerated treatment of the male bodies, with their slim proportions and elegant poses.
